docs.title: Home
docs.text:
I'm Jaemin Oh, a postdoc at Texas A&M University. My research interests lie in the intersection of scientific computing and machine learning, a field known as Scientific Machine Learning (SciML).

Photo credit: Byung-Jun Yoon

For more information, please refer to my CV, Google scholar , and GitHub .

Education

  • Ph.D. Aug. 2020 - Feb. 2025, department of mathematical sciences, Korea advanced institute of science and technology (KAIST), Daejeon, South Korea (advisor: Professor Youngjoon Hong)
  • B.S. Mar. 2015 - Aug. 2020, department of mathematics, Korea University, Seoul, South Korea
    • Military Service, Feb. 2017 - Feb. 2019 @ Korea Air Force, Weather Wing.

News

  • (11/07/2025) I will be delivering a talk at the Crunch Seminar at Brown University.

Contact

first_name = jaemin
last_name = oh
print(f"email: {first_name}_{last_name}🐌tamu.edu")

Please feel free to reach out to me for anything you need!
